Christmas Fruit Mince Pie Review

## New World

New World Christmas Mince Tarts 6pk. Crust: plain, soft underneath and a little crisp around the outside. Filling: sweet, no spice. Ratio (crust to filling): good. Other: no foil 3/5 would eat again
